python
======

python 的一些使用

django模块
----------
- django-flat-theme
- django-ckeditor
- django-admin-sortable2
- django-mptt
- sorl-thumbnail
- django-import-export

其他
----

- sudo apt-get install python-virtualenv
- sudo apt-get install pip
- sudo apt-get install django django-flat-theme xmltodict
